forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with showers and scattered thunderstorms. Storms more numerous during the morning hours. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with more showers at times. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms this evening followed by occasional showers overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm this evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 54F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 62F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
